subject: RE: about[junit] how to test Objects,private Methods
msgSnippet: hi there, ... how about writing public accessor methods in your classes that you could add in parallel with building your test. that way you can expose only
messageBody:
hi there,
> 2) how to check the private methods.....
how about writing public accessor methods in your classes
that you could add in parallel with building your test.
that way you can expose only the data you want to test ???
